channel.title: CVE Feed for MB Connect Line -- mbCONNECT24

item.title: CVE-2023-1779|2024-10-02T05:30:25.424Z -- mb%20connect%20line -- mbconnect24
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an unauthorized actor vulnerabilityÂ in MB Connect Lines mbCONNECT24, mymbCONNECT24 and Helmholz' myREX24 and myREX24.virtual in versions <=2.13.3 allow an authorized remote attacker with low privileges to view a limited amount of another accounts contact information.
